item.name: cpuEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all cpu health status.

item.name: deviceName
item.description: The device name value between 1 to 63 characters.

item.name: deviceSerialNo
item.description: The device serial number value between 1 to 63 characters.

item.name: diskPartitionUsagethreshold
item.description: Percent of hard disk partition usage threshold. This value is in [0,100].

item.name: fanEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all fan health status.

item.name: hardDiskEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all hard disk health status.

item.name: hostName
item.description: The host name between 1 to 64 characters. Supported characters: 0-9 a-z A-Z - ('-' is not allowed to be the first/last character). Default value is xFusion.

item.name: memoryEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all memory health status.

item.name: peakPower
item.description: System peak power, unit is W.

item.name: powerConsumption(kWh)
item.description: Power consume from power statistic start time, unit is kWh.

item.name: powerSupplyEntireStatus
item.description: Information about all power supply health status.

item.name: sysName
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: systemCpuUsage
item.description: Percent of CPU usage. The value defined as: -1: invalid current CPU usage. [0,100]: represents the current CPU usage.

item.name: systemHealth
item.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

item.name: systemMemUsage
item.description: Percent of memory usage. The value defined as: -1: invalid current memory usage. [0,100]: represents the current memory usage.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({xFusion V5 Server iBMC Template:raidControllerStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>2 and {xFusion V5 Server iBMC Template:raidControllerStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<16 ) or {xFusion V5 Server iBMC Template:raidControllerStatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=2
trigger_prototype.name: raidController [{#SNMPVALUE}] status major

trigger.name: systemHealth Critical
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

trigger.name: systemHealth major
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health. This value will be one of the following: (1-OK, 2-Minor, 3-Major, 4-Critical)

trigger.name: systemHealth minor
trigger.description: systemHealth information about system present state of health.

mapping.newvalue: memory correctable error and memory uncorrectable error
memory ECC error reached limit and memory correctable error
memory ECC error reached limit and memory uncorrectable error
memory ECC error reached limit | uncorrectable|correctable error
NVRAM uncorrectable error and memory correctable error
NVRAM uncorrectable error and memory uncorrectable error
NVRAM uncorrectable error and memory ECC error reached limit
